issue.title: [CI] Merge script test fails due to missing dependency
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-12772](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-12772). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
`six` is missing, perhaps github has updated the virtual environment of the hosted actions machines.
